title: Skyline Royale Penthouse
description: Panoramic Arabian Sea vistas with a private sky lounge, infinity pool, and bespoke interiors by Atelier Noir.

title: Elysian Garden Residences
description: A low-density enclave with cascading green terraces, smart home automation, and a signature wellness club.

title: Azure Harbour Villas
description: Beachfront villa ensemble featuring private decks, plunge pools, and curated resort concierge services.

title: The Meridian Residences
description: Art-deco inspired interiors, dual living lounges, and signature sky club for the residents.

title: Celestial Crest Duplex
description: Sun-drenched duplex with double-height living, custom-crafted kitchen, and residents' business lounge.

title: Lunaire Crown Suites
description: Sky homes with curated art collection, sommelier-staffed private dining, and skyline observatory deck.
